Estrella device driver for the Stellarnet EPP2000 series of spectrometers.

0.1

This driver is implemented as a userspace library on top of libusb. It has been written with Linux as a target OS in mind but porting to any libusb supported platform should be easy. If it takes any effort at all.

Estrella can only handle USB devices at the moment but should be easily extensible to drive LPT connected equipment. Provided the IEEE-1284 communications protocol is known of course.

Feedback to bjoern@shugaa.de is always highly appreciated.
